review_data.title: Best restaurant in Zurich

review_data.title: Great Spanish Food
review_data.content: We ate here our first night in Zurich and the place has great Spanish food. The portions are a good size and the prices are reasonable. The staff are friendly and the decor is nicely done, as well.

review_data.title: Great Hospitality and Food
review_data.content: Great recommendations from staffs of Iberia Tapas even thought we were not able to communicate fluently. The staffs are patient and observant to understand what we desired and recommended perfectly the appropriate drinks and delicacies. We have enjoyed ourselves very much.

review_data.title: Outstanding

review_data.title: Amazing Food and Wonderful Service
review_data.content: Spent a wonderful evening enjoying great tapas and gorgeous Sangria in a super sleek and comfortable restaurant. The service was outstanding, the owner couldn't have been kinder or more attentive. I can't wait to visit again and would highly recommend!

review_data.title: Super leckere spanische Küche
review_data.content: Sehr leckeres Essen zu fairen Preisen. Ebenfalls gute Atmosphäre im Restaurant mit sehr gastfreundlicher Bedienung. Sehr empfehlenswert, vielen Dank!

review_data.title: Viva Iberia Tapas!
review_data.content: Der beste Spanier in Zürich ohne abgehobene Preise. Küche ist köstlich, Drinks zum guten Preis. Auf jeden Fall empfehlenswert.

review_data.title: Amazing
review_data.content: Can't believe we found authentic spanish food (not only tapas!) in Zurich at a reasonable price. Surprisingly big menu, good choice and good quality. Relaxed, friendly, everything available as take away. Want to go there again. Very fresh-looking new place. Sincerely recommend.

review_data.title: Endlich ein richtiger Spanier in Zürich!
review_data.content: Tolles Essen und toller Service! Und sogar mein Spanisches Lieblingsbier Estrella! Freuen uns auf das nächste Mal!

review_data.title: Real Spanish Food
review_data.content: Finally a tapas bar/restaurant with authentic and real Spanish food, like home made. I highly recommend the suckling pig leg!!! Excelent Spanish wines from the most prestigeous Spaniard wineries at very low prices because they directly import them.

review_data.title: Much-Needed Great Tapas!!!

review_data.title: Unique
review_data.content: A unique experience - fresh, premium and cosy design. Food is excellent, modern spanish - great service. Innovative as you can order on a screen on the table. Estrella galicia beer tastes fantastic ;)
